name: Amata

topics.topic_text: He's lucky Gomez stopped the fight before I really hurt him.
topics.response_text: Right. That's exactly what I was thinking.{sarcastic, but in a friendly way  she knows that you were the one going to be hurt}Play soundFO3 Amata WhatIWasThinking.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_WhatIWasThinking.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Nothing. Just wishing me a happy birthday.
topics.response_text: Ha ha. Sure he was.{she knows you're being a smartass}Play soundFO3 Amata SureHeWas.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_SureHeWas.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: The jerk tried to steal my sweetroll.
topics.response_text: God, he really is a butthead. Oh well. You can always count on Butch to make an ass of himself. Get it? Ha ha ha.{cheerfully}Play soundFO3 Amata AlwaysCountOnButch.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_AlwaysCountOnButch.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: It was kind of my fault. You know how easy it is to make Butch mad...
topics.response_text: You never learn, do you? You can't help shooting your mouth off even when you know it's going to get you a bloody nose.{shaking her head ruefully but also amused at your foolishness}Play soundFO3 Amata YouNeverLearn.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_YouNeverLearn.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: He wanted my sweetroll, but I told him off. <Lie.>
topics.response_text: Wow. You're so tough. You'll have to teach me how to do that, sometime.{she doesn't really believe you, but she's playing along}Play soundFO3 Amata YoureSoTough.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_YoureSoTough.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: He, um... He made me give him my sweetroll.
topics.response_text: God, what a jerk. I hate him! You'd think he'd be happy he actually got invited to your party.{sincerely pissed off at Butch}Play soundFO3 Amata WhatAJerk.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_WhatAJerk.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I don't want to talk about it.
topics.response_text: I know. Butch. What else is there to say, right?{sympathetically}Play soundFO3 Amata IKnowButch.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_IKnowButch.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Don't worry about me. I'm not scared of him.
topics.response_text: I know. He thinks he's so tough. One of these days we'll figure out a way to get him back, okay?{commiserating about the annoyance of having to deal with Butch}Play soundFO3 Amata HeThinksHesTough.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_HeThinksHesTough.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I wouldn't give him what he wanted. He says he's going to make me sorry later.
topics.response_text: That jerk! I can't believe he'd try to ruin your birthday party!{flaring up with anger at Butch}Play soundFO3 Amata CantBelieveHedTry.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_CantBelieveHedTry.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Your dad's the Overseer. Can't you talk to him about Butch?
topics.response_text: Come on. Don't ask me that. You know he would if I asked, but where would that leave me?Play soundFO3 Amata DontAskMeThat.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_DontAskMeThat.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You didn't fool me. I just pretended not to know. <Lie.>
topics.response_text: You're such a liar! Okay, if you're so smart, what did I get you for your birthday?Play soundFO3 Amata YoureSuchALiar.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_YoureSuchALiar.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Great party, Amata! Thanks for doing this for me.
topics.response_text: You're welcome. But really, your dad did most of it. I just helped with the decorations and stuff.{pleased}Play soundFO3 Amata YoureWelcome.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_YoureWelcome.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Is this it? Or hasn't the real party started yet?
topics.response_text: Shut up! And it isn't my fault that Butch and Wally are here. Your dad said we had to invite them.{annoyed, but in a friendly way  she knows (assumes) you were just kidding}Play soundFO3 Amata ItIsntMyFault.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_ItIsntMyFault.oggnoicon

Ha! I knew I'd surprise you. Who's your favorite barbarian? That's right, Grognak! Issue 14, and with no missing pages!Play soundFO3 Amata KnewIdSurpriseYou.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_KnewIdSurpriseYou.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Um... a date with Christine Kendall?
topics.response_text: Gross! I didn't think you even liked girls. And you know what I mean, before you say something rude about me.{just friendly ribbing between good friends}Play soundFO3 Amata DidntThinkYouLikedGirlâ€¦https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_DidntThinkYouLikedGirls.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Just give me the present already!
topics.response_text: Okay, okay! One last question: who's your favorite barbarian? That's right, Grognak! Issue 14, and with no missing pages!{laughing at your impatience  she's enjoying teasing you with the present}Play soundFO3 Amata OneLastQuestion.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_OneLastQuestion.oggnoicon

What's Butch's problem anyway? I can't believe he tried to start a fight at your own birthday party. What a jerk.Play soundFO3 Amata WhatsButchsProblem.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_WhatsButchsProblem.oggnoicon

We've been in here for 3 months now, and it's way better than it used to be. Who says kids can't take care of themselves?Play soundFO3 Amata BeenInHere.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_BeenInHere.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: Argh! This is supposed to be a party! You know, fun. You should try it sometime, Daddy. You might like it.{"Argh!" should be done as "frustrated girl sound".}Play soundFO3 Amata SupposedToBeParty.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_SupposedToBeParty.oggnoicon
Of course it is. After all, I helped plan it!{she's at least half-joking}Play soundFO3 Amata OfCourseItIs.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_OfCourseItIs.oggnoicon
Thanks, Daddy. I'm glad you're having a good time.Play soundFO3 Amata ThanksDaddy.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Amata_ThanksDaddy.oggnoicon

description:
Amata is a 19 year-old Hispanic Female.

The only daughter of the Overseer of Vault 101, Amata is a young woman who grew up alongside the Lone Wanderer. Despite her privileged position, she values independence and has formed a deep friendship with the Vault's newest resident.

Amata's Personality: Independent, resourceful, and resilient, Amata dislikes relying on her father's position and prefers to solve problems on her own. She is loyal to her friends but has a strong sense of self and doesn't shy away from challenges. Despite her father's controlling nature, she has developed into a thoughtful young woman with natural leadership qualities.

Amata's Backstory: Born as the only child of Vault 101's Overseer, Amata has spent her entire life within the Vault's walls. She developed a close friendship with the Lone Wanderer after their arrival in 2277. Growing up, she faced bullying from the Tunnel Snakes led by Butch DeLoria, who mocked her appearance and made lewd suggestions. Despite her father's awareness of the situation, she refused to leverage his position for protection, relying instead on her friendship with the Lone Wanderer. Amata values independence and has always sought to prove herself as more than just the Overseer's daughter.
